name: Airplane Game (Sandwich_Boi, Selin D)
description:
A game about controlling an airplane by walking on top of it.

This was a semester project that was done with selindoga, so there are a lot of questionable and broken stuff in the game. (like the super unnecessary quit button) So yeah, sorry about those.

Controls:

  • wasd - moving around
  • mouse1 - shooting (only when time is frozen)
  • mouse2 - freeze time

Credits:

  • Berkay Sarıtaş
  • Selin Doğa Orhan
